recommendations: Brooke Warner
General Manager, Sierra Nevada Media Group and Swift New Ventures at Swift Communications, Inc.
February 8, 2014, Brooke was a client of Gordon’s

When I came back to media in 2009 I'd already had a variety of experiences and had some general  notions about the state of the industry including what it took to take a company through digital transformation. But in working with Gordon and his team, using the insights, networking, advice and data they provide, the picture for success came into sharp focus fueling our speedy trajectory to best practices. Gordon is a tireless champion for media devoted to helping companies large and small navigate disrupted waters to arrive safely in the digital future. Gordon has his finger on the pulse of what's going on in pure plays and digital media alike, tapping into the minds of media masters, cultural wonks, and those down in the trenches. He is especially tapped into the engine that drives it all, the advertisers. Gordon has created a wide and deep industry network, encouraging collaboration so that everyone can learn what does and doesn't work. He's been fearless about making sure that the industry has the information it needs, regardless of anyone's opinions about that medicine. I've had the opportunity to tap into his valuable network and I've had the honor of contributing in kind. Gordon doesn't stand on the shoulders of giants, he tells them where they should be going.
Brooke Warner

summary: I've been in the media industry since the 1970s, starting as a newspaper reporter. After holding various executive positions at Landmark Communications Inc., I started Borrell Associates in 2001 as a market research firm that tracks and forecasts the lifeblood of local media, advertising. Today it serves more than 1,300 companies across North America and the U.K.Borrell's primary product is Compass, an interactive database of advertising expenditures in any of the 3,000+ U.S. and U.K. counties and Canadian provinces. The company also publishes analyses on trends, offers revenue benchmarking for local digital ventures, gives presentations to companies and trade associations, and holds the largest gathering of local digital media professionals in North America -- the annual Local Online Advertising Conference in New York City, held every March.I am married, have five children, and live in the Hampton Roads, Virginia, area, where I've been active in youth sports, fundraising, and education.
name: Gordon Borrell
title: CEO of Borrell Associates Inc.
